org.araneaframework.uilib.list.structure
Interface ListFilter

All Superinterfaces:
ExpressionBuilder, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AndFilter, BaseFieldFilter, BaseFilter, BaseRangeFilter, BaseRangeInRangeFilter, EndsWithFilter, EqualFilter, GreaterThanFilter, InFilter, LikeFilter, LowerThanFilter, MultiFilter, NotFilter, NullFilter, OrFilter, RangeFilter, RangeInRangeFilter, SqlFunctionFilter, SqlFunctionFilter.Equal, SqlFunctionFilter.GreaterThan, SqlFunctionFilter.GreaterThanOrEquals, SqlFunctionFilter.LowerThan, SqlFunctionFilter.LowerThanOrEquals, StartsWithFilter
public interface ListFilter
extends ExpressionBuilder

Static list filtering information that can be used along with FilterInfo to build FilterExpression (an Expression that evualuates into Boolean.TRUE when the filter matches with the current record that a VariableResolver provides and Boolean.FALSE otherwise).
